div.p: Here are some examples of valid headers. In each case, the emphasised text represents the text that would be used as the header in an application extracting header data and ignoring subheadings.
div.pre:
The reality dysfunction

Space is not the only void

Dr. Strangelove

Or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
